definition: panic-stricken (idiom)/to be in a flustered state/also written 張惶失措|张惶失措[zhang1 huang2 shi1 cuo4]
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
to handle/to manage/to put in order/to arrange/to administer/to execute/to take action on/to plan

sentences.english: Our surprise attack put the enemy into a flutter.
sentences.chinese: 我們的奇襲使敵人張皇失措。

sentences.english: Jack lost his head in dealing with his strong opponent.
sentences.chinese: 傑克張皇失措地處理與他的強有力的對手。
